t: Jeff Bezos' first desk at Amazon was a door with four-by-fours for legs—here's why it still is today
s: January 23, 2018 - So when Amazon's then-handful of employees needed desks, the entrepreneur found a cheap solution — he hacked them together himself with a door as the desktop and four-by-fours for legs. These days, Amazon has a $650 billion market cap and CEO Jeff Bezos is the richest man in the world.
